column1: Master of Buckland was a hereditary title among the Bucklanders Hobbits. As the head of the Brandybuck Family
column2: he was also known as the Master of the Brandy Hall. Like the Thain and Warden of Westmarch
column3: the Master had only nominal authority.

column1: It was traditional for each of the Masters to have an epigraph attached to their names
The first Master was Thain Gorhendad Oldbuck
column2: after he left the Shire and moved to Buckland in . The holder of the title was accepted as the leader of Buckland
column3: and several farms in the Marish as well. After the War of the Ring ()
column4: King Aragorn made the Master of Buckland one of the Mayor Counsellors of the Arnor.
